Review.Titre: The best purchase I've ever made!
Review.Contenu: The best purchase I've ever made. FocusMe has changed my life and I've been able to unlock incredible amounts of willpower and intense focus.It's much better than all the equivalent products out there. I always recommend FocusMe to anyone looking to get ahead.

Review.Titre: Long time user, support always helpful
Review.Contenu: I've been using FocusMe for several years now, and it's been very helpful. Customer service is fantastic, I've reached out to them for help several times and they are always prompt with a solution.

Review.Titre: Amazing product, amazing service
Review.Contenu: This product really helps me getting my focus for work I value but get distracted from frequently. Whenever there occurs a problem or I block myself from essential services using the product, the service is just amazingly fast and helpful!

Review.Titre: Can be set to be impossible to circumvent. 10/10
Review.Contenu: Before buying this I always gave in to distractions and let my work pile up. Now I'm forced to be productive because I've set the blockers to be impossible to circumvent. This is such an underrated feature and I'm surprised no other blocking software I've seen has it! I'm many times more productive now than before. Mere willpower does not compare at all. I would recommend FocusMe to anyone who struggles with digital distractions.

Review.Titre: Sync Folder / Log in
Review.Contenu: The response from the support was very quick and very efficient - even though my problem was very specific, every email from the technician was always right on the money, getting closer and closer to fixing it. Congratulations on the pragmatism and objectiveness - those are the best qualities for a support technician!

Review.Titre: Hi my name is Mario, and i'm a workaholic...
Review.Contenu: Sometimes you have discipline other times you don't. This software allows me to respect my working hours. I'm a workaholicFor me it blocks certain software at specific time.Technologically it just work. You won't know it exists. It doesn't slow down the computer.Just buy it... get you life back...User for 5 years now...

Review.Titre: Probably the best software I've purchased
Review.Contenu: If you want to have more control over your digital environment, get FocusMe. Seriously, it's the best app out there. It can do anything you want it to with unlimited customizability and if setup properly is nearly impossible to workaround. The value add to your life and mental well-being is worth 50x the asking price.

Review.Titre: Great support
Review.Contenu: Support people were knowledgeable, fast and able to solve my problem easily

Review.Titre: Helpful if your addicted to your screen and self control isnt enough
Review.Contenu: Indulging too much in entertainement on screens, it was affecting my life in many levels. I tried to manage this by myself, but eventually I realised I lacked the self control. This really helped me.Plus you can customize your plan, you can add websites to the forbidden list WHILE your plan is active, you can set an uninstall protection to make sure you dont get rid of the software in a moment of weakness...

Review.Titre: Unique Site Blocking Focus Software that Works!
Review.Contenu: FocusMe is the only software I've tried that can reliably block websites and apps for periods of time. It's very easy to adjust to block sites for time periods from 15 minutes to months or years if you want. If you are a procrastinator, you know it's easy to get around a lot of methods like blocking sites through your browser and so forth. The customer service team is very responsive and helpful too if you have any questions or need to stop a blocking plan.

Review.Titre: Great tool and excellent support!
Review.Contenu: The focusMe application is a really great tool as it is simple, lean and can be highly individualized to one's current needs. Also the support when having problems is great! Clear, kind, persistent and very helpful!

Review.Titre: Easiest recommendation of my life
Review.Contenu: Great product, genuinely feel like there are human beings working on this app (and in the support team, too), thoroughly recommend this to anyone who is on the fence.

Review.Titre: Excellent product & support !!!
Review.Contenu: I have been a Focusme customer for a few months now and I just love the software. It's simple & easy to use. My favourite feature is the "uninstall protection". The support is just as great as the product. Support is quick and after a support request, the support team actually follows up to see if the problem was resolved.Its really good value for money !A well deserved 5 stars !!!

Review.Titre: Life-changing... From procrastinator to successful business in 6 months
Review.Contenu: One day 10 years ago while freelancing on upwork (odesk), I realized I had only gotten 3 hours of actual productive work done all day. The rest of the time was lost on all kinds of digital distractions. I started using FocusMe a week later and within 6 months I finally launched my first successful business. That was 5 years later than intended, but hey. Better late than never!I don't think I could have done it without FocusMe. Digital distractions are productivity death by a thousand cuts. Silicon Valley pays brain scientists millions to make their products as addictive and distracting as possible. I’ve tried just about all other distraction blockers on the market, but they are easily circumvented. FocusMe has a “forced” mode – you WILL get your work done.I'm an evangelist for this program. I always tell everyone about it. In this day and age, unless you have the willpower of a Tibetan Temple Elder, you may not even realize how many countless hours get lost every day, seeping through the cracks, seconds and minutes at a time. Unnoticed. Adding up to years of your life.How much is it worth to get your life back? To finally get around to all the things you've been putting off for years? A million dollars? I don't know. What I do know is that I can't possibly recommend this program highly enough. FocusMe I want your autograph! If you were a woman I'd marry you. If I was a woman I'd want your baby.

Review.Titre: Focusme is the best there is for the job
Review.Contenu: I think there is really not great alternatives around for blocking and focus programs. Focusme is super customizable with how you can set up your plans, and with forced mode you can not cheat. Customer care is also top notch. I've owned the program for many years now and I've always got answers to my questions within few days.

Review.Titre: Love it!
Review.Contenu: Been using for only 2-3 days and still kind of working out which of the protections works best for me but already saved hours of time and feel a lot happier! The blocks are impossible to cancel other than the canceling/pause method you set which is way better than other apps.

Review.Titre: Amazing product with excellent customer service
Review.Contenu: FocusMe has been the best tool I've used in my life. Particularly during the pandemic years, I had succumbed more and more to internet distractions, wasting time on the computer instead of working, sleeping, or spending time with family. With FocusMe, I can now flexibly block what I need to, without having the option of removing FocusMe completely. The value is 100x what I pay.

Review.Titre: Great customer support!
Review.Contenu: Great customer support!  I've been using this for years, and I've always had the best interactions whenever I've needed help with any features. More generally, I find the product *extremely* useful for keeping me productive.

Review.Titre: Useful product, great cost, and great service
Review.Contenu: I've used FocusMe for years to help me, and I decided to use it for some parental control on my middle schooler's laptop. Support helped me figure out how to do that and it's working great now!

Review.Titre: Good product and good value
Review.Contenu: Good product that is robust about helping you focus. Takes a bit of time to get it set up exactly for what you may need but worth the investment - though default time plans will probably work for most people. When I needed to contact support they were very responsive and helpful.

Review.Titre: This website is best to curb time waste
Review.Contenu: I have been using this website for sometime, it works perfectly well in blocking websites and apps. I feel I have saved lot of time in not using social media since i started using FocusMe. There are multiple configurations such time limiting, blocking straight aways, or seting hourly limit for apps and websites. Even if you run into a problem customer support is quick to give solution. I 100% recommend this app.

Review.Titre: FocusMe is Protected From Bypassing
Review.Contenu: I love how protected the software is. With many website blockers, there are ways around them. However, FocusMe has predicted many possible escape routes, which I love, being that I am tech savvy.

Review.Titre: Taking control of digital distractions
Review.Contenu: Focus Me is the most effective focus app I've found. I've used it for several years and they've continuously been listening to user feedback and updating its functionality. Their response time to issues is always on the same-day. With complex issues they book a video session to help you figure it out. I can't ask for more. This tool is as water-tight as you can get and it has genuinely improved the quality of my life: no longer am I a complete automaton in the digital world.

Review.Titre: Great blocking software with much flexibility
Review.Contenu: I was recommended this software by a friend of mine. Having tried other blocking softwares before I must say this one is the best one out here simply because it allows for so much flexibilty.It has all the basics from automatic blocking to advanvced features where you even can block specific words, or entirely block youtube but keep specific study playlists which really has helped me. Granted there may be small bugs but they are nothing compared to the benefits of this softwareThe staff are also always ready to help

Review.Titre: Amazingly great app
Review.Contenu: Amazingly great app. Top of the line content through and through. Right amount of notifications and good tone. Can highly recommend

Review.Titre: Extremely helpful and effective!
Review.Contenu: FocusMe is very helpful to people like me who have difficulty maintaining focus. I mainly use the app to prevent myself from using Facebook, visiting shopping websites, and using non-work related apps, during times when I should be working. I have only used a couple of features so far and it already has improved my productivity a lot! Can't wait to further explore it.Keep up the good work FocusMe team!

Review.Titre: Easily-customizable software that…
Review.Contenu: Easily-customizable software that allows you to control how you spend time on your computer. Capable of blocking websites and software by way of address, name, title, etc. Can setup up multiple plans that run concurrently.  If you make a mistake by making security too tight or lenient, a message to the support team will have them respond within half an hour from my experience.  Software is updated regularly. This is a product I would recommend for someone looking to get their computer habits under control.

Review.Titre: FocusMe is an essencial software if you feel you are getting too much distracted by the internet
Review.Contenu: I've been using FocusMe for some years now and ,in my perspective,  it's just the best website blocker and focus app there is.Nowadays it's so easy to get distracted on the internet and FocusMe provides many ways for you to put some obstacles between you and these distractions.I can honestly say that this software is totally worth it and that it made a huge difference on my life.Not only that, but the support is also great!10/10

Review.Titre: Concrete Product, Awesome Customer Service
Review.Contenu: Focusme has helped me cut down my compulsive internet surfing down by 90%. Down this path there were few issues to which FocusMe team was very receptive and then moved fast to solve. The product in itself provides a wide array of functionality starting from the core blocking functionality to the regex based website blocking which really helps to stay away from websites you don't want to go to. Thanks team.

Review.Titre: There are things you want to do, but are hard, and FocusMe has made me look forward to doing them.
Review.Contenu: FocusMe completely changed my productivity levels and my life really. I have tried other blocker systems, FocusMe has been the best one for me by far. Every workaround you could think of there is a way to block it. It's really nice to be able to boot up the PC and do what I actually want to do, instead of having to do it while fighting off distractions. All that stuff about deep work, context-switching and attention residue has gotten atleast 80% easier for me to do, I frankly do not think I could do any of that without this program.Additionally the support staff has always been extremely helpful, and they are always available and understanding, a very big thank you to Ryan and Lorenz!

Review.Titre: FocusMe is an effective time management…
Review.Contenu: FocusMe is an effective time management app that helped me curb a video game addiction immediately back in 2018. It provides structure and limits that helped me regain control of my schedule. The app itself is very simple and offers a few handy features like graphing your time on apps and websites. The dev is responsive to feedback and writes a good blog, too.

Review.Titre: Product is quite good
Review.Contenu: Product is quite good, there are two issues though:1. Some features were not working initially, I think this is fixed now.2. After one year of subscription, service was automatically extended for one more year and my credit card was charged, which is not what was my intention.Edit: great reaction from FocusMe, same day I have submitted my review, they have cancelled my subscription extension and returned me money for it, changed to 5 stars. Thanks!

Review.Titre: Can't Live Without It
Review.Contenu: This app is NECESSARY for a healthy, productive digital life. It is highly customisable and the support team is particularly excellent. They will work with you thoroughly and will tirelessly answer every question or comment. Help is quick and abundant through instant live chat, e-mail, or you could even hold a Zoom call with support if you would like to speak to someone through video. I am forever grateful to the support team and this app.

Review.Titre: No Other Program Like It!
Review.Contenu: This is a one-of-a kind program! It really has the power to enforce specific time, app, and website limits. Unlike other applications that be easily circumvented, FocusMe does an excellent job at preventing workarounds. This is a great program if you want to limit your child's screen time or if you just want to be less distracted yourself from things like social media, video games, etc.The support team is also amazing: they are quick to respond to concerns, listen to feedback, and often implement suggestions from users.

Review.Titre: Best of its kind
Review.Contenu: Having tried a few different top blockers it is true to say, without hyperbole, that this app is the very best blocker available. Besides its strong features, it is very receptive to costumer queries and concerns. I was previously a Cold Turkey user and discovered a loophole around their blocks, which they were unable to fix. However this same loophole was quickly attended to and patched up by the FocusMe team. If you want to gain control over the areas of your life in which control is lacking this app is certain to do that for you.

Review.Titre: App really does everything you need to…
Review.Contenu: App really does everything you need to keep you away from distractions. Full flexibility regarding the options you have. In previous apps I've complained that the options are generic so you get one benefit but pay with a counterpart. Not the case of this one.

Review.Titre: Good app for time management
Review.Contenu: Good app for time management. Block websites and apps at certain times or organise scheduled times for use. VERY flexible app...you can set it up in so many ways. Excellent communication and chat function from FocusMe team.

Review.Titre: Really really good
Review.Contenu: I've tried various of these productivity apps. I use them to limit my access to all of the internet, and to some social media on my laptop, and sometimes to 'lock' my entire laptop. Focusme is by far the best, I've been using it for 3 years now. It's very versatile, works without hickups and the customer service is amazingly prompt, friendly and helpful with any issues or questions.

Review.Titre: FocusMe is a wonderful app to block…
Review.Contenu: FocusMe is a wonderful app to block unwanted apps, websites, and search words on google.com. FocusMe has helped me enormously throughout the years. FocusMe helps me focus (hence the name) on what is important for me. The software has a ton of features and settings to customize the user experience. I can highly recommend FocusMe. There is also a version for android. FocusMe is in a constant development process, so new features and new versions are being released regularly. If you have an addiction or problems with overuse of social media, FocusMe is a must have for you

Review.Titre: Excellent software, outstanding support
Review.Contenu: I've been using focusme for around 3 years now and honestly it's been the best investment both in terms of productivity, and just having a healthier amount of screen time. The software is really flexible, allowing you to set various lists of apps or websites to block, and for specific durations, times of day etc. I've had a couple minor issues with device activation in the past, but their support team has always been incredibly helpful and quick to resolve. Highly recommend!

Review.Titre: Training my discipline day by day
Review.Contenu: I have just started with this app a week ago and wow- I thought 'I don't need one of those - I'll manage my own discipline' but no- I 'did' need help. There are times when the sensible part of my brain has great intentions, followed by the obsessive compulsive part of my brain changing the intention - for those times - this app works for me 100%.  I set an intention - literally set it in FocusMe... and I then have to follow through. Once you set the app on force mode, you cannot stop it. This feature is so good for me because I 'would' turn it off otherwise. I just wish there was an app like this for my diet, my budget, my whole life lol...But overall- it 'is' training my discipline muscles too - so I think it really will help me all round. I love it

Review.Titre: Works great as stated
Review.Contenu: The product works very well with many different options and limits to help allow better focus on the things that matter. Great product and works as stated.

Review.Titre: Most apps have loopholes but Focusme is different...
Review.Contenu: I have tried many apps to help with digital distractions, but I always find loopholes. FocusMe is the one app that I just can't get around. After a few months of using it, I found the "Emergency Stop" feature. Essentially, you have to email the support team for a code. I was a bit worried because suddenly it seemed easy to stop strict blocks. However, the team offered to add a time delay for any future "emergency stop" requests, which I set to three days, more than enough time for willpower to kick in. It works with most browsers, but there are a bunch of niche productivity browsers that are not natively supported. Luckily, you can add these to the Application block list to avoid getting sneaky. Overall, I'm very happy with the app and it's well worth the monthly subscription fee. If you are serious about cutting out digital distractions, FocusMe is the only real choice.

Review.Titre: Focus Me is an amazing company with a great product
Review.Contenu: Excellent company and service. I've been a customer for five years and their product has helped me stay focused and kept me off distracting sites. Their customer service is excellent as well.

Review.Titre: The reps are always helpful and ensure…
Review.Contenu: The reps are always helpful and ensure the problem gets resolved. Hats off!

Review.Titre: The only tool that I've found that ACTUALLY WORKS
Review.Contenu: This is the only tool that I've found that can effectively block sites and keep me from visiting the distracting and unproductive parts of the internet. I highly recommend it!

Review.Titre: this is by far the most effective tool…
Review.Contenu: this is by far the most effective tool to help you overcome any internet addictions.. if you struggle with your screen that steal you a lot of time and energy, then you can use focusme.   it is clear, understandable, easy to use, and very very effective.. also the help center is always available, and really really nice..  take your power back, internet is full of attention and energy stealer.. use this tool!! thanks thanks thanks

Review.Titre: Never been disappointed
Review.Contenu: Never been disappointed. Has saved me many hours of time. Can be a little technical (such as I am unsure if I can block URL's containing a specific word?). Overall, definitely the best software for limiting the internet out there. Highly customisable.

Review.Titre: great product and top class service
Review.Contenu: Focusme is a great product that gets the job done but more importantly their service is top class. I have been in communication with their support team many times and they always answer quickly and provide top notch assistance. Lorenz has helped me many times, he is a 10/10. Ryan and others are very good as well.For the price they charge it is easily worth it.

Review.Titre: Give FocusMe a Try - It worked for me
Review.Contenu: Whether you problem is getting distracted by social media or being a bit of a workaholic, FocusME will improve you productivity and your health.This app helps me take care of myself. When I am working, I forget to take breaks. Sometimes I do not even have lunch. Ryan and I had a virtual meeting. He helped me get the settings right so that my computer would not let me work once it was break time. This has made a huge difference in my health - especially my lower back which needs a break from sitting in the chair. The support team is wonderful.

Review.Titre: Sometimes you need an external restraint
Review.Contenu: This is the best app blocker I know about. Willpower and resolutions only go so far. Sometimes you need an external restraint to make the right choice. FocusMe is worth far more than its price. It's easy to use and it will prevent you from wasting hours of your life on unproductive tasks.I've been using it since 2015 and plan to use it for the foreseeable future.

Review.Titre: A must-have product
Review.Contenu: Thanks to Focus Me, I'm able to focus on things that are genuinely important to me. The team are also very helpful and responsive. I would say this is a must-have product living in a distracted world.

Review.Titre: Time and tide wait for none& what FocusMe means to me
Review.Contenu: I agree, all apps have their issues, none is perfect. The only way we can get close to perfection is by constantly evolving from feedback. FocusMe has done what it claims,-ME-I, AM FOCUSED. The incredible customer service, the energy and passion they put into their growth is phenomenal.I wish them all the best, and I WILL BE FOREVER be your client and so will a few of my friends!!FocusMe -healthy mind, liberation from addiction, social media and Junk!!“Regret for wasted time is more wasted time ”― Mason CooleyDO NOT WASTE TIME BUY FOCUSME(Not a sponsored review)

Review.Titre: Really amazing customer service
Review.Contenu: As usual the team is very supportive and kind, they always solve everything

Review.Titre: Fantastic Tech Support by Ryan
Review.Contenu: Was helped by a staff member named Ryan and he was just fantastic. I messaged in the live chat and had left the chat afterward forgetting about my question, but I was emailed immediately regarding the contents of my issue. Focus me support is unbelievable, this is the second time I've reviewed help from them, and it's fast and very extensive as always. Thank you!!!

Review.Titre: Best blocking software
Review.Contenu: This software (for Windows) is the one and only I've came accross that is able to block ANY program and ANY website or expressions within an URL that I want to be blocked. Furthermore it is virtually impossible to bybass or kill this program - even if you are an administrator! It is by far the most comprehensive blocking software that exists - I've purchased and testet several ones.

Review.Titre: Procreations Killer
Review.Contenu: I waited to have the full experience before giving my review. I am using the program more than 2 months, and I recommend it for everyone that have problems with procreations. It help me to restrain my "monkey mind", and they have "forced" mode which blocking you from changing the settings you did (amazing!).moreover, their customer support is great. they answer quickly. when I had an issue with the program, 2 days later they issued update to the program and fixed it.Happy that I found this program.

Review.Titre: Extremely powerful and useful tool
Review.Contenu: Extremely powerful and useful tool for productivity.  Helps me block websites that are built to be a time-suck like Facebook or Youtube, especially while I don't want to browse while I am working.

Review.Titre: Helps keep you focused on whatever goal…
Review.Contenu: Helps keep you focused on whatever goal you have set, whether its taking classes in college or just reducing the amount of time wasted on social media. The app is simple to use and easy to understand. It really is life changing!

Review.Titre: Consistently helpful, thorough, & effective productivity aid and content blocker.
Review.Contenu: I've been using FocusMe for several years now and it is truly one of the best apps for what it claims to do: Helping to block unwated content/sites and schedulng/controlling internet usage to help you be more productive and above reproach on your device. It is amazing at all of these things.They've thought of everything when it comes to their settings. Any way that a sneaky brain could think of getting around Focusme in a moment of weakness: disabling it, using another user account, incognito, etc... the people at FocusMe have thought of it and have added a setting to intercept that workaround. Secondly, the times that I have had tech issues or questions, the customer support has always been incredibly good, patient, clear, and helpful. I'm very grateful for FocusMe and I highly recommend it.

Review.Titre: Customer Service that actually solved my problem
Review.Contenu: I got a couple 3 year subscriptions for 2 devices - big fan. I was running into a payment error and customer service resolved the issue *very* quickly. Ryan went above and beyond and even offered to send me the activation keys over chat. I didn't have to hope and wait for an email with the codes after the chat finished. I got them right then, right there. Problem solved.

Review.Titre: I use this app for my 2 kids
Review.Contenu: I use this app for my 2 kids, one in high school and the other in grade school. It's used for both their gaming PC and phones so I can rest assured that they are paying attention to school when they need to and are sleeping online. This also enables me to have their PCs inside their bedrooms but still have some peace of mind.I only purchased after running the free trial on this app and all the other mainstream ones. But decided on this one because it was the few that lets me target specific websites and apps all the while having flexible schedules and different ways to manage the restrictions. The pricing is excellent for what you get, one of the best out there and support is superb.

Review.Titre: Excellent app
Review.Contenu: Excellent app, we got it to help our son concentrating when we saw his grades slipping for all the online distractions, we made a schedule with him and he is able to focus much better! I love the fact it cannot be changed, he tried to hack it at first lol

Review.Titre: Excellent customer support and product
Review.Contenu: Excellent customer support. I found the anwers very thorough and detailed and my questions were answered within a day.Very useful product to manage your time effectively. I use this product daily in different platforms to avoid spending too much time on unproductive websites or with unproductive applications. It also provides tools to prevent yourself from self-sabotaging your time by disabling the product which I find very useful. I would like to see more improvements on the Android version of the product as I believe is not at the same level as the Windows and MacOS versions.

Review.Titre: The app is an absolute beast and is one…
Review.Contenu: The app is an absolute beast and is one of the best blockers out there, I had a terrific experience with the product as well as the online support team, everyone was humble and caring. The team is ready to assist always, I really appreciate the gesture of the team when they extended my trial so I could have some more time when I needed it. Also got a nice discount on first purchase, Really happy with the product as well as service.

Review.Titre: This is a life saver!!
Review.Contenu: I don't usually write reviews but for this I have to. I've been using this for 3 years and its the best bit of software out there. Its helped me to manage my digital world addiction and has made me productive in other areas.

Review.Titre: This software is a Godsend
Review.Contenu: The software has been a Godsend for me over the years. I was an early adopter and I still rely on it every day while working at home. I can control almost every aspect of my computer usage so it has been a great help in keeping me on the right track while working. I plan on using it for my boys as well when they're old enough to use a computer.

Review.Titre: Highly recommended
Review.Contenu: This is by far the most versatile, fully-featured and robust blocking software, and I tried most of them. You can make the rules as simple or as complicated as you want.I don't often leave reviews, but FocusMe's customer support have gone above and beyond to resolve a few issues I had and even implemented a new feature request and they deserve all the business they get.

Review.Titre: Helped me break habits
Review.Contenu: I've been a FocusMe user for a few years now, and can safely say that it played a big part in me breaking the habits I wanted to. I now use less social media and have managed to keep distracting tools & websites at bay until set times.

Review.Titre: Focus me has been a god send
Review.Contenu: Focus me has been a god send. As someone with compulsion issues, this program has helped me focus and prevented me from giving into so many time wasters. The fact that its difficult to remove helps even more.

Review.Titre: very good for managing your time and blocking distractions (Gaming, Social media, etc..)
Review.Contenu: They are constantly updating the app (adding new features and fixing bugs).Their customer support are very helpful and friendly.The app is very good at blocking distractions and really helped me with my studying.

Review.Titre: I am a valorant player.
Review.Contenu: I am a valorant player.I used to play a lot but then one day FocusMe came out of no where and saved me from becoming a addict.Ohh Actually I became an addict then I paid and downloaded FocusMe.

Review.Titre: A Focus App with More Options and Less Loopholes
Review.Contenu: FocusMe is a fantastic program that keeps even the most tech-savvy people productive. I have had trouble keeping myself accountable for the hours I have wasted on my computer. I had tried other focus apps before but tended to find loopholes to exploit and disliked their singled-minded approach (usually, the only options are to block or not block websites/applications). FocusMe fixes many of these issues, with other options, like time limits and breaks. I have yet to bypass the program and only occasionally found bugs. FocusMe fixes them quickly or provides me with alternative actions.The interface, at times, can be a little confusing, and some of the functions I never use. However, FocusMe has been very actively pushing to improve the program.Overall, I am pleased with FocusMe. It has effectively forced me to start doing more productive things with my time!

Review.Titre: Sometimes your own focus is sufficient…
Review.Contenu: Sometimes your own focus is sufficient to get the work done. At other times, a helping hand is needed. For me, I rely on FocusMe when I need a helping hand in upholding my attention. It works - and when it doesn't, the helpdesk makes it work quickly and efficiently.

Review.Titre: This is one of the best companies that…
Review.Contenu: This is one of the best companies existed right now and let me tell you why: 1). They focus everything on support. Try their support, it's always there. They care and provide solutions. 2). Free 30 day trial, not asking for a credit card! 3). The product does wonders, it works flawlessly and it can act like your higher self, keeping you Focused. 4). The price is extremely undervalued. You pay for a year what you pay for a month on Netflix! And try considering the value each has on your life and future. I would easily pay 5-10 dollars/month for this. Thank you.

Review.Titre: the online helper spent hours with me…
Review.Contenu: the online helper spent hours with me trying o explain the installatio. a couple of issues with tht androoid,, i think the signposting on the website culd save more time

Review.Titre: One of the best apps to heal you from digital addictions.
Review.Contenu: Hi,I tried freedom.to, and other free website extensions like blocksite, etc. But I never succeeded because I always gave in to the strong urges. I always found a way to deactivate the software and relapsed countless times. But my whole perspective towards digital addictions changed when I tried FocusMe. It's an extremely powerful and intelligent tool. You just can't cheat this software. Once installed and activated, this software will act like a strict teacher that will go above and beyond to fix you. P.S. - I would recommend using Mindfulness techniques along with this app. Don't completely rely on the software. This is because once that strong urge comes back, your mind will go extremely crazy. In that particular moment, you need some techniques to calm yourself down, and mindfulness will help you in that situation. Also, you can make this app Super Strict if you want. Check its advanced settings and enable the features accordingly to your needs. This app has saved my life and I will recommend it to all those people who are infected by Digital Distraction.

Review.Titre: FocusMe is the best tool for managing…
Review.Contenu: FocusMe is the best tool for managing self-sabotaging procrastinative behaviour!I have a tendency to get distracted and FocusMe helps prevent that. During moments of mental clarity I will set up a Forced plan to prevent access to websites. By the time, I am tempted, my computer has been secured by FocusMe and prevents access so I can focus on my job & work from home.I've been using this service for 2 years and I highly recommend it to friends & family.Also, in case you do lock yourself out as I did recently, the Customer service & support is excellent!

Review.Titre: Help got to me fast when I needed it
Review.Contenu: I was having technical issues over the weekend and the support team reacted very fast to my issue and contacted me directly. FocusMe has been my saviour from distraction but also from things that drain my energy. A great tool for productivity but also for well-being!

Review.Titre: Great useful program that blocked all…
Review.Contenu: Great useful program that blocked all distractions as I was writing my dissertation, my journal article and applying for jobs. It's super effective at keeping me focused, takes a little bit of time to set up preferences, but it's very simple and user friendly. Cannot recommend it enough, 100% worth the annual fee.

Review.Titre: I came across this site on Google and…
Review.Contenu: I came across this site on Google and the service fees are less than other sites such as Freedom and Barke. What I like most about FocusMe is that my daughter cannot uninstall it which is a problem I've had with other sites. I am very impressed and will recommend you to others. And the staff are very friendly and so helpful.

Review.Titre: Louie Lorenz was such a great help this…
Review.Contenu: Louie Lorenz was such a great help this morning as I was trying to resolve an annoying technical difficulty I was having. He was patient, kind, knowledgeable, and prompt. Two thumbs up for Louie Lorenz!

Review.Titre: 24 hour clock within hours
Review.Contenu: I was in a need for a 24clock in the Windows app as I have never used AM/PM. Within hours of my request it was integrated and a new version of the software was released. Never experienced such a good costumer service delivered so fast!

Review.Titre: Great
Review.Contenu: Great, i'm from Nicaragua, Central America. I know about fous reading a book. It's great, I can focus in one activity, one by one without procrastination. Tks

Review.Titre: Does the job, saves your time and protects you from distraction.
Review.Contenu: It helps me to remain protected from my dark deep distractions. It helps me to come out of entanglements and unlock my true potential and purpose. Just like a stomach disease gets cured when we don't eat anything, similarly, using this wonderful tool I starved my distractions and regained my original happy state of focused existence.

Review.Titre: Essential Software
Review.Contenu: I find FocusMe is a totally essential tool for helping to keep my screen time on track. Being able to limit screen time and stay distraction free has had a really positive impact on my concentration, productivity and mental wellbeing all round.I've used FocusMe for a couple of years now - it is the best Windows tool for this I've come across and it has continued to function well through innumerable Windows updates. I contacted the customer service at today following a minor glitch and the person I spoke to was really helpful and friendly - and we got the issue resolved in really good time. It's definitely worth it - 100% recommended!

Review.Titre: Prompt response
Review.Contenu: I appreciate the prompt response.  It's nice that there are still tech companies that will provide phone and zoom support rather than just chat. The rep was able to quickly solve my problem, was polite, and listened.

Review.Titre: Where do I start..
Review.Contenu: Where do I start... I use FocusMe now for 6 months... And I was looking for a mobile equivalent of another blocker I had installed on my computer. I can tell that FocusMe is very bulletproof. Tampering with the settings becomes impossible when a block is active. Screens will close when you try to enter a blocked application or website.There is just no one coming close to FocusMe in turns of smartphone blockers on Android or iOS. Not one being so user friendly and tamper safe. And the best thing of it all I have to mention yet. Ive had a bug (but it was due to my own doing, it had nothing to do with the app). And the support team immediately helped me through their chat. And when I disconnected from chat, they made sure to follow up on mail and helped me to solve the issue I had eventually.5 star app in terms of software and support. 😀

Review.Titre: Started using FocusMe six years ago. I continue to rely on it heavily.
Review.Contenu: I have been using FocusMe software on all my PCs and phones since 2017 (over six years). I have a paid license.  I don't often write reviews for software, however in this case I would really like to commend the developers of FocusMe.  As someone who spends more than 8 hours a day at a computer, it is easy to let it take over your life, even to the point where I found myself watching, chatting and posting even when I didn't particularly want to.  I wanted to take control of my time, and FocusMe was a really good solution. FocusMe differed from other products because it handled the entire scope of the problem: 1) lock out specific programs, websites, and social media from my kids, 2) lock out some of the same stuff from me, 3) not interfere with special internet use (like GitHub, or work related youtube), and 4) to provide a range of solutions for partial lockout, by time, location, overall usage, multiple password schemes, etc.  And lastly, they do a really good job protecting the software from anyone who might trying to hack around it, including myself.

Review.Titre: Solid Application for Blocking
Review.Contenu: A very solid app. Customer support is very quick to respond. I highly recommend this app versus other blockers that I have tried in the past. Have been a 2 year customer and will continue to do so.

Review.Titre: Pretty good idea
Review.Contenu: Pretty good idea, changed a lot for me.Instead of spending 4-6 hours on youtube and Co. I now spend 4-6 hours on studying, doing sport, reading, yoga, meditating .... and and and. A pretty huge Game Changer, tho pretty insane I need that in this society to not be depressed and consume all the time.I would love to have more options in this programm. And of course I would love for it to be available on linux soon. The only bad thing is that Operating systems like mac or linux will always have a lot of ways to disable the app.It's just hard to take the control from an admin.But for everyone thinking about getting this programm ... do it !!! It will change your life ! ( not an exaggeration )

Review.Titre: Very Useful Program and Excellent Customer Service
Review.Contenu: I have been using FocusMe at work for several years to limit computer procrastination.  It is very effective in doing that.  The program has also saved me money by allowing me to limit the time spent on certain large shopping sites.  Having used the program for a long time, I have also come to appreciate the responsiveness of the FocusMe customer support. They are quick to respond, but above all helpful. They have helped me many times with technical issues, and the tech team even implemented several new features I had suggested/requested.

Review.Titre: The only way I get anything done
Review.Contenu: This is the best blocking app I have EVER used.  The customer support is insane.  And the app gets updates all the time.  I also love the different settings and amount of customization.   My productivity would be in the shitter without it.  LOVE this app.

Review.Titre: Keeps you focused! Amazing support
Review.Contenu: Very effective app that helps to keep me focused on the important things! It's extremely hard to circumvent it, which helps enormously with follow-through.The FocusMe-team is amazing, constructive and supportive. I suggested a feature several years ago and the founder reached out to me personally to inform me that it was implemented some time later.

Review.Titre: Had a rocky start but we got the ball rolling
Review.Contenu: After a shaky start with a less than intuitive set-up wizard and even going as far as asking for a refund, the FocusMe team reached out to me and offered me a complimentary set-up call. That's not something that you get everyday. The level of attention was fantastic and Ryan had me up and running in 10-15 minutes and we realized that I had selected an option that was mucking up the way I wanted the software to run.Again, this is due to what I consider a somewhat unintuitive set-up wizard, but after we got the proper settings in place this runs like a dream and has dramatically increased my productivity since I'm so easily distracted even by Wikipedia!Thank you Ryan and the support team at FocusMe!

Review.Titre: My best investment on me with Focus.me
Review.Contenu: Truly, focus.me has made a significant difference in both my work and personal life. I consider this tool one of the best investments I've made to date. Thanks to its usage, I was able to complete substantial projects at work, elevating my efficiency to levels I'd never reached before.In the past, I was easily distracted by reading or watching anime, and it wasn't easy to resist the temptation. However, focus.me has entirely changed the landscape. With its smart technology, my screen shuts off automatically, eliminating the need for conscious effort to avoid distractions. It is a definitive solution for any individual or company looking to increase their productivity.I cannot overlook their exceptional customer service. In my experience, the communication was seamless and I received assistance in less than an hour. They truly are an incredible team offering constant support.My heartfelt thanks to focus.me for its existence. With great anticipation, I hope they continue to expand and provide us with their invaluable support for much more time. Keep up the excellent work!

Review.Titre: Indispensable! Trouble adjusting plans.
Review.Contenu: I did have some problems when I first started using FocuseMe but have sense worked with their customer support team to fix them. I am very satisfied with both the product and their customer support.

Review.Titre: Best! Best! Best
Review.Contenu: I completed my one year with Focusme Today and I Can't express my thanks to this application, i have saved my hours daily and have achieved my year-long goals successfully. The support is Amazing and friendly and never disappointed, i will be repurchasing it and this program will stay forever with me to maintain discipline at every moment of my life!

Review.Titre: Excellently designed app
Review.Contenu: Great app, i really appreciate the level of customization like disabling the ability to uninstall or close using task manager. This is an example of great software design. Good job
